QuestData.Title: What's Happening to the Blackwood Furbolg?
QuestData.Description: Our ancestors lived alongside the Blackwood furbolgs for generations. But recently, we have lost contact with their settlements deeper in the forest. One of their larger villages, Blackwood Hold, can be found to the south.$B$BTravel there and find Elder Brolg. Ask him why his people have withdrawn from us and offer your help, if necessary.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Elder Brolg at Blackwood Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: Why have you come here, outsider?$B$B<You tell the elder that you were sent by Foriel Broadleaf at the Grove of the Ancients. He seems to relax slightly.>$B$BThe elf is right. The forces of Felwood have seeped into Darkshore and sickened my people.
